00008 #include "otherclockdriverseditor.h"

00010 #include "clockdriversdelegate.h"

00012 #include <QHeaderView>
00013 
00014 OtherClockDriversEditor::OtherClockDriversEditor(QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00015                                                                                                  QWidget *parent): 
00016 ItemEditor(component, parent),
00017 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00018 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00019 view_(this), model_(component, this) {
00020 
00021         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00022                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00023         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00024                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00025 
00026         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00027                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00028         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00029                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00030         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00031                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00032         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00033                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00034 
00035         // set view to be sortable
00036         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00037         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00038         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00039         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00040         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00041         //view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00042         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00043         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00044         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00045 
00046         view_.setItemDelegate(new ClockDriversDelegate(this));
00047 
00048         // set proxy to do the sorting automatically
00049         proxy_ = new QSortFilterProxyModel(this);
00050 
00051         // set source model for proxy
00052         proxy_->setSourceModel(&model_);
00053         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00054         view_.setModel(proxy_);
00055 
00056         // sort the view
00057         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00058 
00059         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00060         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00061         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00062         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00063 
00064         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00065         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00066         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00067         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00068 
00069         model_.restore();
00070 }

00072 OtherClockDriversEditor::~OtherClockDriversEditor() {
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool OtherClockDriversEditor::isValid() const {
00076         return model_.isValid();
00077 }
00078 
00079 void OtherClockDriversEditor::onRemove() {
00080         QModelIndex index = proxy_->mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00081 
00082         // if index is valid then remove the row
00083         if (index.isValid())
00084                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00085 }
00086 
00087 void OtherClockDriversEditor::makeChanges() {
00088         model_.apply();
00089 }
